faq.title: Clear Your Doubts
faq.subtitle: Clear Your Doubts
faq.description: Everything you need to know about LinkKarma

questions.question: What is the Proof of Contribution system?
questions.answer: It's the heart of LinkKarma. To post a showcase, you need to contribute to the community by using referral links or helping with community verification. This ensures quality and eliminates spam. You need 3 Contribution Credits to unlock a new showcase slot.

questions.question: How does AI showcase creation work?
questions.answer: Our AI automatically analyzes your referral link, extracts service information, and creates a professional showcase with title, description, advantages, FAQ, and step-by-step guide. We use Google Gemini AI to ensure high-quality content. You can customize everything before publishing.

questions.question: What are Karma Points and how to use them?
questions.answer: Karma Points (KP) are LinkKarma's internal currency. You earn KP by contributing to the community (15 KP per referral use, 10 KP per verification). Use KP to boost your showcases (25 KP = 24h at the top) or feature them (100 KP = 7 days highlighted).

questions.question: How does security verification work?
questions.answer: We have a hybrid system: our AI does the first analysis checking sources like Trustpilot, Reclame Aqui, and app stores. Then, the community can do additional verifications. Showcases only go public after approval in the security system.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
questions.answer: Yes! You can cancel your Pro subscription anytime. Your showcases will remain active until the end of the paid period, then return to free plan limitations.

questions.question: How does the anti-spam system work?
questions.answer: The Proof of Contribution system is our main anti-spam mechanism. Additionally, we have mandatory security verification, community moderation, and daily action limits to prevent abusive behavior.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: Our team is ready to help you get started with LinkKarma
